text: kya unake aise pov bhee hain jinase chal saken ya unake aise haath bhee hain jinase (kisee cheez ko) pakad sake ya unakee aisee okhe bhee hai jinase dekh saken ya unake aise kaan hain jinase sun saken (ai rasool un logon se) kah do ki tum apane banae hue shareeko ko bulao phir sab milakar mujh par dov chale phir (mujhe) mohalat na do
